alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:55PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Teton County through 330 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Victor, or near Driggs, and near Tetonia moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alta around 305 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grand Teton, Leigh Lake and Moran Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
